alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Northern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Barnstable, central Plymouth and northeastern Bristol Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carver, or 7 miles west of Plymouth, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Taunton, Bridgewater, Middleborough, Wareham, Sandwich, Bourne, Raynham, Kingston, Carver, Lakeville, Halifax, Rochester, and Plympton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Barnstable; Northern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
